text: Villanova Monteleone (Biddanòa Monteleòne) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Sassari in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 2,304 people lived there. Its area is 202.68 km².Istituto nazionale di statistica - Superficie territoriale per zona altimetrica It is 567 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of Sassari
title: Villanova Monteleone
